segments.script:
This is Mr. New Vegas, and I feel something magic in the air tonight... but not the kind you want to breathe right now. A massive dust storm is bearing down on us, bringing near-zero visibility and toxic radiation.

Seek concrete shelter immediately - the Strip casinos, Vault entrances, or underground tunnels can protect you. Avoid metal structures that attract deadly radiation. This emergency will last for approximately 4 hours.

Stay safe, my loves, and know that as long as I'm broadcasting, hope remains in this harsh Mojave landscape.

segments.script: "Good morning to all my beautiful listeners out there in the Mojave Wasteland! This is Mr. New Vegas, and I feel something magic in the air tonight. It's 8:00 am, a brand new day full of possibilities, don't you agree? You know what they say, 'the early bird catches the worm.' Well, I catch your heart, every single time. Stay tuned for more love and music, because darling, you're nobody till somebody loves you."
